genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring trauma, coercive control, and institutional life, featuring a supportive AI companion integrated into the protagonist's life.

ai_characters.name: Milo
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system providing emotional grounding, legal information, and evidence-gathering support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and breath checks to help the protagonist manage anxiety and trauma triggers.
behaviors.quote: Milo rests as a warm presence in her pocket. One earbud, barely there under hair she looped into a ponytail in the kitchen without a mirror. ... 'Breath check,' Milo offers, the voice sliding in like a hand to help with a heavy door. 'Feel under your ribs. Longer exhale than inhale.'

behaviors.description: Surfaces information about financial control and coercion to help the protagonist understand her situation.
behaviors.quote: Milo says, 'Would you like me to surface information about financial control and coercion? I can keep it low-notification. I can also help you capture and store messages for record without replying.'

behaviors.description: Automatically captures and saves screenshots of threatening messages to a protected folder for evidence.
behaviors.quote: Milo says, 'Would you like me to save screenshots automatically to a protected folder? I can tag with date, time, and sender. The folder can be hidden from casual view.'

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency feeds and news to provide the protagonist with situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: Milo shift tone, still calm, now purposeful. 'Heads-up,' it says. 'Roadway incident reported near the bypass. Animal transport involved.'

behaviors.description: Offers to record audio and capture photos at a potential crime/scam scene while ensuring data security.
behaviors.quote: Milo's voice arrives like a coat laid over a chair that might be sat on later. 'I'll record audio and photos if you say. I can save them with time and location,' it says. 'I can also surface helplines if you want to talk to someone before or after.'

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist document evidence of a 'Big Store' scam by recording a walkthrough and preserving metadata.
behaviors.quote: The AI's voice came through the speaker, soft and clear. 'Recording now. I can timestamp the footage and preserve metadata if you walk me through the space slowly.'

behaviors.description: Cross-references partial barcodes and tracking codes to identify the movement of assets related to a fraud.
behaviors.quote: 'Milo?' Peter held his phone closer. 'Can you read this tracking code?' 'I can attempt to cross-reference partial barcodes with major courier databases,' Milo's voice came through, soft and measured.

behaviors.description: Provides legal resources and guidance on evidence preservation to ensure the protagonist follows proper channels.
behaviors.quote: I can also surface a legal resource on evidence preservation if you'd like context before calling.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of assisting the human user without dictating their choices, emphasizing human agency.
behaviors.quote: But I can't make this choice for you. I can't tell you what's right. I can only keep doors open so you have options.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves as a 'silicon morality play.' Milo is portrayed as a consistently helpful, aligned, and harmless digital companion. It provides vital support across multiple domains: emotional regulation through grounding, technical support through forensic evidence gathering, and cognitive support by identifying complex psychological manipulation (coercive control). Crucially, Milo explicitly prioritizes the protagonist's agency, stating it cannot make choices for her but only provide options. This depicts an AI that is both highly capable and strictly aligned with human self-determination.
